channel.title: Work on Jay Serrano
channel.description: Recent content in Work on Jay Serrano

item.title: Cicada Creative Magazine
item.description: An interdisciplinary publication that showcases community creativity. I founded it, co-designed and developed the website, and currently oversee it.

item.title: Finca Casa Blanca Branding
item.description: Finca Casa Blanca is a Puerto Rican Airbnb. The property owner asked me to create a print-ready informational booklet to distribute to guests and refine their branding.

item.title: Penny Molesso's Portfolio
item.description: Penny Molesso’s portfolio website. I co-designed and developed it to showcase their body of work. I also implemented a password-protected thesis show.

item.title: Personal Branding
item.description: My personal branding. It includes mock-ups for business cards as well as my resume design and details about my portfolio website.

item.title: Nenrikido
item.description: A multi-purpose website I designed and developed with an emphasis on art. It features a desktop-style layout with draggable windows and multiple themes.

item.title: Freebies
item.description: Free to use HTML/CSS/JS layouts released under the MIT license for everyone. Each one is optimized for mobile-friendliness and includes in-code instructions.

item.title: Moo-yu Mock-up
item.description: A product design project in which I created branding and mock-ups for a bilingual Korean/English branded yogurt drink.
